patthana23.38:1.1: Naajjhattārammaṇaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ajjhattārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
patthana23.38:2.1: Naajjhattārammaṇaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ajjhattārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
